inclusion.criterion: tumor not located in brainstem, midbrain, or ventricular system
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: planning to undergo standard radiation therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: performance status KPS > or equal to 70
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: serum creatinine < 2mg/dl and calculated creatinine clearance >10ml/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient of reproductive age agrees to use birth control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to tolerate MRI scan procedure
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently undergoing treatment. However, they have prior radiation therapy to the brain which makes them ineligible for this study.
